# ZipcodeUS

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ZipcodeUS is to provide data and tools for those looking for plot their address data. 


## Example


```{r example}
library(ZipcodeUS)
x <- c("1234", "Li123"," 1234")
y <- c("800 E Summit St, Kent, OH, 44240", "900 E Summit St, Kent, OH, 23")
get_zip(y)
contain_letter(get_zip(y))
clean_zip(x)
```

## Zip table

head(zip_table)
